comments.raw_text:
We should figure out what values of the type attribute we really ought to support on li, ol, ul, dir, and menu.  We currently support a bunch that don't appear to be in other browsers, and our support is inconsistent between the elements.

HTML5 says:
http://dev.w3.org/html5/spec/grouping-content.html#attr-ol-type (which only describes type on ol)
http://dev.w3.org/html5/spec/rendering.html#decohints (which describes type on ol, ul, and li)

Browser support seems drastically different; testcase to be attached.


While working on this we may also want to fix bug 241719.
